scenes.action_text: DARKMAN Written by Joshua & Daniel Goldin, Sam & Ivan Raimi and Chuck Pfarrer February 1989 INT. PIER BUILDING - DAY BANG!! A shock chord as we cut from black to a harshly toplit CLOSE SHOT: A man is talking into a cellular phone. He is a paunchy but powerful looking black man, bald with a gray fringe. His baldness makes his head look muscular; he
